title: AttentionComparisonResult
description: AST predict-compare result showing control success rate

prior_prediction.description: IDs predicted to be in focus from previous tick

actual_focus.description: IDs that actually entered the workspace this tick

control_success_rate.description: Fraction of predicted items that actually appeared in focus

correct_predictions.description: IDs that were both predicted and actually focused

missed_predictions.description: IDs that were predicted but did not appear in focus

unexpected_focus.description: IDs that appeared in focus but were not predicted
